short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cockpit transforms browser into a pilot view from high above the clouds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the tranquil yet awe-inspiring sight of the sun rising over the horizon, with the soft glow of the sky blending seamlessly into the illuminated cockpit panels. This theme is perfect for aviation enthusiasts, frequent travelers, or anyone who dreams of exploring the skies. The contrast between the vibrant colors of the dawn and the intricate details of the cockpit instrumentation provides a dynamic yet calming visual experience, taking you on a virtual flight every time you open a new tab.

Key features:
- Beautiful pilotâ€™s view background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
